articles.description: For those who want to be tested for COVID-19, the Department of Health and Environmental Control will be setting up shop at five different locations this week in Charleston County. The mobile testing clinics will bring testing to underserved communities where…

articles.title: 148 deaths, 1,789 confirmed cases of COVID-19 in Monroe County - RochesterFirst
articles.description: There are 46 new confirmed cases of the virus since Saturday bringing the total to 1,789 cases in the county.
articles.content:
ROCHESTER, N.Y. (WROC) The Monroe County Department of Public Health confirmed on Sunday that 148 people in the county have died from the coronavirus. 
There are 46 new confirmed cases of the virus since Saturday bringing the total to 1,789 cases in the coun… [+896 chars]

articles.author: Alexandra Sternlicht
articles.title: Coronavirus Found In Semen: Can It Be Sexually Transmitted? - Forbes
articles.description: A new study found COVID-19 in semen of male patients.
articles.content:
Coronavirus was found in semen of recovering and acute male COVID-19 patients in a small study conducted in January and February in China, though it remains unknown, according to the CDC, whether the disease can be transmitted sexually.
It is unknown whether… [+2496 chars]

articles.title: Virus continues to prey on elderly in Kingman area - Kdminer
articles.description: Another Kingman-area resident has passed away from complications of COVID-19, bringing the death toll to 16 in the Kingman service area and 22 in Mohave County.
articles.content:
KINGMAN -- Another Kingman-area resident has passed away from complications of COVID-19, bringing the death toll to 16 in the Kingman service area and 22 in Mohave County.
The deceased is an adult in the 86 and over age range, whose infection was linked to a… [+1756 chars]

articles.title: The One Symptom That Predicts How Bad Your Coronavirus Case Will Be - msnNOW
articles.description: Very few COVID-19 cases look the same. But a recent study found that one coronavirus symptom may predict just how serious your other symptoms will become.
articles.content: COVID-19 has made its way across the world over the past several months, with more than three million people infected with the coronavirus so far, according to the World Health Organization (WHO). However, not every case of COVID-19 looks the same. Some peopl… [+3270 chars]
